entry.summary: Making the Financial Case for Modernizing Your Environment The cloud revolution is here, but many organizations are hesitant to tackle…
entry.content:
Making the Financial Case for Modernizing Your Environment 

The cloud revolution is here, but many organizations are hesitant to tackle the task of migrating their data and applications to a cloud environment. How do you evaluate if a migration is worth the effort? What are the actual financial benefits of cloud transformation?

In this webinar, ACTS CIO Advisor, Shawn Pickett will host a discussion with Greg Miller, former CIO of Genuine Parts Company (GPC), to explain their first-hand experience with a large cloud migration project at a global automotive replacement parts organization that serves thousands of customers. They will discuss the key challenges, internal perceptions, and considerations Greg took on to ensure an efficient and optimized journey to the Microsoft cloud.

In this session, you will hear about the significant factors to consider when you are at the beginning, middle or end of a cloud migration project – with best practices directly from a CIO who executed a cloud transformation project.

entry.title: Webinar | Oct 21 | Optimizing Compute on Azure with Azure Kubernetes Services
entry.summary: Azure Kubernetes Services is not a one-size-fits-all tool. An organization can tailor AKS to meet its goals in several ways,…
entry.content:
Azure Kubernetes Services is not a one-size-fits-all tool. An organization can tailor AKS to meet its goals in several ways, ranging from single-node development clusters to dynamically scaling, high-performance clusters for production workloads. In this webinar, we will look at all the knobs and switches you can use to shape AKS to align with your app needs. We’ll cover autoscaling, node pools, and virtual nodes to give you the whole gamut of all the possibilities.

entry.title: Webinar | Nov 4 | Azure Storage Options with Azure Kubernetes Services
entry.summary: Azure has many different ways to store data, and each one comes with its own pricing and performance characteristics. The…
entry.content:
Azure has many different ways to store data, and each one comes with its own pricing and performance characteristics. The cool thing about Azure Kubernetes Services is that it can connect to all of them, so you can match the storage performance and cost goals of just about any application. In this webinar, we’ll look at how to connect AKS to Azure Blob Storage, Azure File Storage, Azure Disks, and Azure NetApp Files to give you the full scope and scale of these options. Then we’ll compare them compare the cost and performance considerations.

entry.summary: Kubernetes and its surrounding cloud-native technologies are taking the world by storm. More and more organizations are making significant investments…
entry.content:
Kubernetes and its surrounding cloud-native technologies are taking the world by storm. More and more organizations are making significant investments into Kubernetes platforms. But, if you were starting from scratch, do you know what all your options are?

It can be overwhelming - there are many different ways to deploy a container on Azure. Join us in this free, 2-hour workshop, where we will step through the basics of containerization, how to host a container without Kubernetes, and how to host a container on different Kubernetes distributions like Azure RedHat OpenShift.

This free webinar is led by BoxBoat Technologies, a Microsoft Gold Partner.
